Phase77Description:
Having dug Yasir out of the sand, he's asked that I help free his family, else they are next in the sand.

He'll need a weapon before he can be of any help.
Phase14Description:
On the beaches of Shipwreck Cove, I found a man buried up to his neck in the sand. The man, Yasir, asked that I dig him out.

Seeing the bloated, drowned corpses that litter the beach, it seems I shouldn't delay.
Phase24Description:
Having dug Yasir out of the sand, he's asked that I help free his family, else they are next in the sand.

Weapon in hand, Yasir is ready to free his family.
Toast: A man buried in the sand. A family slated for execution.
Phase40Description: I've rescued Yasir and his family. I should head to the rendezvous point.
Name: When the Tide Comes In
